name: ProductRevenueDetailPanel
functionalRequirements:
## Product Revenue Detail Panel Sub-Component

### Purpose
Slide-out panel displaying detailed product metrics and trends.

### Core Features
- **Performance Metrics**: Revenue, units, margin, customers
- **Pricing Details**: List price, cost, average selling price
- **Revenue Trend Chart**: 12-month trend visualization
- **Explorer Link**: Open full product record
- **Smooth Animations**: Slide-in/out transitions
technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Panel Structure
- Fixed position slide-out panel
- Chart.js for trend visualization
- Metric cards with color coding
- Responsive layout
